languages.text: {n}Пиратка прищуривается.{/n} "Это что же, вы теперь как Ее Светлость с одного взгляда грешника от праведника отличить можете? Впрочем, о том, что у старой пиратки за душой не один грешок имеется, догадаться любой может, а вот в служении Архиврагу меня обвиняют впервые. Обижаете, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пиратка прищуривается.{/n} "Это что же, вы теперь как Ее Светлость с одного взгляда грешника от праведника отличить можете? Впрочем, о том, что у старой пиратки за душой не один грешок имеется, догадаться любой может, а вот в служении Архиврагу меня обвиняют впервые. Обижаете, Ваша Светлость!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
languages.original_text: {n}Пиратка прищуривается.{/n} "Это что же, вы теперь как Ее Светлость с одного взгляда грешника от праведника отличить можете? Впрочем, о том, что у старой пиратки за душой не один грешок имеется, догадаться любой может, а вот в служении Архиврагу меня обвиняют впервые. Обижаете, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate squints.{/n} "What, you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look and you can tell a sinner from a righteous one? I mean, it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a sin or two to her name, but no one's ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. I resent that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate squints.{/n} "What, you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look and you can tell a sinner from a righteous one? I mean, it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a sin or two to her name, but no one's ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. I resent that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate squints.{/n} "What, you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell a miscreant from a righteous one? I mean, it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a transgression or two to her name, but no one's ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. I resent that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate squints.{/n} "What, you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell a miscreant from a righteous one? I mean, it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a transgression or two to her name, but no one's ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. I resent that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}莱萨眯起了眼睛。{/n}“怎么，大人，你怎么和那位女士一模一样了？怎么光看一眼，就能分辨出谁是好人，谁是坏人？你看，大人，我身为海盗，违反犯罪个一两次恐怕是难免的，但从来没有人指控我为混沌大敌效力。你这话可太伤人了，大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨眯起了眼睛。{/n}“怎么，大人，你怎么和那位女士一模一样了？怎么光看一眼，就能分辨出谁是好人，谁是坏人？我是说，身为海盗，违反犯罪个一两次恐怕是难免的，但从来没有人指控我为混沌大敌效力。我对他们深恶痛绝，大人！”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}海賊は目を細めた。{/n}「えっと、つまり今のあなたは女帝のような人だと？一目見れば、善と悪の見分けがつくんです？海賊が過去に過ちのひとつやふたつ起こしたことなら誰にでも推測できるでしょうが、私が渾沌の勢力に仕えていたことは、誰にも見破られたことはありません。プライドが傷つきましたよ、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海賊は目を細めた。{/n}「えっと、つまり今のあなたは女帝のような人だと？一目見れば、善と悪の見分けがつくんです？海賊が過去に過ちのひとつやふたつ起こしたことなら誰にでも推測できるでしょうが、私が渾沌の勢力に仕えていたことは、誰にも見破られたことはありません。プライドが傷つきましたよ、陛下！」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}La pirata entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué, ahora es como su señoría? ¿Con una mirada puede distinguir a los malvados de los justos? Supongo que es bastante fácil adivinar que una pirata lleva consigo un par de fechorías, pero nadie me ha acusado nunca de servir al Archienemigo. ¡Eso me ofende, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La pirata entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué, ahora es como su señoría? ¿Con una mirada puede distinguir a un malhechor de alguien honrado? Quiero decir, es bastante fácil adivinar que una pirata lleva consigo una o dos transgresiones, pero nadie me ha acusado nunca de servir al archienemigo. ¡Eso me ofende, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Die Piratin kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was, seid Ihr jetzt etwa wie {mf|Ihre|die andere} Ladyschaft? Ein Blick und Ihr könnt die Bösen von den Rechtschaffenen unterscheiden? Nun ja, bei einer Piratin lässt sich leicht erraten, dass sie die eine oder andere Missetat begangen hat, aber dass ich dem Erzfeind diene, das hat mir noch niemand vorgeworfen. Das trifft mich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Piratin kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was, seid Ihr jetzt etwa wie {mf|Ihre|die andere} Ladyschaft? Ein Blick und Ihr könnt einen Sünder von einem rechtschaffenen Engel unterscheiden? Ich meine, bei einer Piratin lässt sich leicht erraten, dass sie das eine oder andere Verbrechen begangen hat, aber dass ich dem Erzfeind diene, das hat mir noch niemand vorgeworfen. Das finde ich gar nicht nett, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}La pirate plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous voulez faire de la concurrence à Son Infaillible Seigneurie ? Il vous suffit d'un seul regard pour distinguer les vertueux des mécréants ? Évidemment qu'une pirate a un ou deux méfaits à son actif, mais c'est bien la première fois qu'on m'accuse de servir le Grand Ennemi. Vous me blessez, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La pirate plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous voulez faire de la concurrence à Son Infaillible Seigneurie ? Il vous suffit d'un seul regard pour distinguer un vertueux d'un mécréant ? Évidemment qu'une pirate a une ou deux transgressions à son actif, mais c'est bien la première fois qu'on m'accuse de servir le Grand Ennemi. Vous me vexez, Votre Seigneurie ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Korsan, gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Ne o, Leydi Hazretleri bize yetmedi mi yoksa? Bir bakışta iyiyi kötüden ayırt ediyorsun, öyle mi? Karşındaki korsan olunca ömründe bir iki hata ettiğini anlarsın, neyse. Fakat Şerbaşı'na hizmet etmekle ilk kez suçlanıyorum. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, güceniyorum ama!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate narrows her eyes.{/n} "What, so you're like {mf|Her|the other} Ladyship now? One look, and you can tell the wicked from the righteous? I suppose it's easy enough to guess that a pirate has a misdeed or two to her name, but no one has ever accused me of serving the Archenemy before. You wound me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
